title: Champion select bug
body: everytime i queue up for a ranked game, my client will close whenever champ select happens, i don't know why this  happening

replies.body: I've seen reports of this happening to some players, and the culprit appears to be third party programs that interact with League.  If you have any running like play.tv, your best bet would be to remove them.  Test it out in a custom game, but this should get you fixed up!
